pages.text: The set Crimtane Gem, itself a creation of the Nether, can absorb high temperatures on you with ease.$(br)Set in this circlet it even protects you from the blazing heat of lava - if only for a short time, until it has had a chance to cool down again.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(li)Prevents damage from fire and hot floors.$(li)Grants you a short protection from lava
